meanings.definition: A therapeutic massage using water jets or currents.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, I treated myself to a relaxing hydromassage at the spa.
meanings.sent2: The hydromassage at the wellness center helped ease my muscle tension.
meanings.sent3: During the hydromassage, I felt like a human fountain being pampered.
meanings.sent4: The hydromassage was like a gentle waterfall soothing my aches and pains.
meanings.sent5: The sensation of the hydromassage was as refreshing as a cool stream on a hot day.

meanings.definition: The act of receiving a massage using water jets or currents.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the hydromassage as the water jets worked on her back.
meanings.sent2: The hydromassage session left me feeling rejuvenated and relaxed.
meanings.sent3: During the hydromassage, I imagined myself as a mermaid getting pampered.
meanings.sent4: The hydromassage experience was like being embraced by a gentle wave.
meanings.sent5: The soothing hydromassage made me feel like I was floating on a cloud.
